title: Shut Your Eyes
description: ‘I’d like to tell him we’re never through with the past, that it’s with us forever, sometimes out of sight, sometimes in full view, always unchangeable. We can only ever learn from it … and manage the consequences.’Spending time apart from the man she loves, Maya’s forced to survive in a world where nothing is what it seems. With her faith tested to the limit, a trip to New York sets off a train of events that will reunite her with Dan, but threaten to destroy everything they’ve worked so hard for.Now, neither of them can hide from the past. If their love is to survive, they need to deal with the threats and face the truth.Shut Your Eyes, an erotic romance, is the final book in the You Don’t Know Me Trilogy
author: Mandy  Lee
